text: Alişer Efendî (Kurdish: Alişêr Efendî; 1862–9 July 1937), was a Kurdish military leader and poet. He organized the Koçgiri rebellion. He was one of the leaders of Dersim rebellion. He fought against the Ottoman Empire during World War I. == References == == Sources == * Category:Kurdish activists Category:1862 births Category:1937 deaths
title: Alişer
